meanings.sent1: His constant complaining disharmonizes the team.
meanings.sent2: The loud argument disharmonizes the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog disharmonizes the quiet neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her negative attitude disharmonizes the positive vibes in the room.
meanings.sent5: The off-key singing disharmonizes the beautiful melody.

meanings.definition: To disrupt the harmony or balance of something
meanings.sent1: Adding too much salt disharmonizes the flavors of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The construction noise disharmonizes the tranquility of the park.
meanings.sent3: The broken piano disharmonizes the music class.
meanings.sent4: The stormy weather disharmonizes the outdoor event.
meanings.sent5: The conflicting schedules disharmonize the team's workflow.
